EN

The article mentions GTCFX's role as an Elite Sponsor at iFX EXPO Dubai 2026, but primarily focuses on interviews with industry executives. Dor Eligula, Co-Founder & Chief Business Officer at BridgeWise, discusses how his AI-powered research firm is supporting brokers and exchanges, identifies growth opportunities in Asian markets, and explains how AI and human judgment work together in investment research. The article also mentions Brendan Callan, CEO of TRADU, who successfully argued against the proposition that prop trading is good for the industry, criticizing the current model for being too fee-dependent, loose on risk management, and confusing for retail investors.

Key Points

  • GTCFX to be Elite Sponsor at iFX EXPO Dubai 2026
  • BridgeWise discusses AI integration in investment research and Asian market opportunities
  • TRADU CEO criticizes current prop trading model for fee-dependency and poor risk management

Article

In this interview, Brendan explains the reasoning behind his position. He walks through the message he believes many firms avoid: that the current prop trading model is too dependent on fees, too loose on risk, and too confusing for retail audiences. We discuss why he thinks the model grew fast, why it may run into walls, and what he believes is needed for a cleaner, more responsible version of prop trading. This is Brendan at his frankest ‚Äî sharp, grounded, and very clear about what changes are overdue.
